name: "Sitting By The Pool" by Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
description: [Various pens and colored pencils on reclaimed cardboard.] A true story and based on an actual pool! I drew this while watching young yahoos in very little clothing drink heavily and "frolic about" in a salt water pool in Vegas. It was HOT, and the drinks were EXPENSIVE! (I think my wife paid $14 for a soda for me... Disgusting...) ---Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
